title: The Culinary art of Japan
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Japan - Social life and customs

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Food presentation
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Rites and ceremonies - Japan
description: Japanese cooking is unique. It is based on seasonal culinary specialities, the preparation and serving of which is considered to be an art. Shows the buying of fresh fish and vegetables, the tea ceremony, a traditional dinner, cooking schools, family meals and the preparation of sukiyaki, tempura and sushi.
